name: Aviary
description: A place connected to food production or animal husbandry; adventurers could hire mounts, resupply, or quell beasts.
atmosphere: The air is filled with the melodic songs and calls of exotic birds, creating a symphony of natural music. The scent of fresh seeds, clean straw, and the subtle tang of feathers fills the space. Colorful plumage flashes as birds move between perches, while the gentle rustle of wings adds to the peaceful atmosphere.
